name: Coffee Slush
author: karenpoole
summary: This make-ahead frozen beverage made with coffee and half and half is perfect for teas and showers. Simple yet delicious! Save coffee from the day before in the fridge. Everyone will want your recipe!
directions: Mix cream, coffee, sugar, and vanilla extract together in a freezer-safe container
Cover container and freeze until coffee mixture is solid, at least 3 hours
Remove container from freezer and defrost in room temperature for 1 hour
Break coffee mixture apart with a fork creating a slush-like consistency
Transfer to a punch bowl or large pitcher
